name: The Golden Cat
description:
How to play: to turn the character around the player has to move around the mouse, to move the character use the WASD keys or Arrow keys. To pause the game the player presses the Escape key(ESC) and chooses to resume or quit the game or return to the menu.

In order to interact with the objects in the museum, the player has to press the “E” key. To turn the flashlight off and on, the player has to press the “P” key.

More information
